CustomField.description: Shows if any related Activation Lines have an error message
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Activation_Line_Warning_Trigger__c , "Red"), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error24.png", "Red", 16, 16), IF( ISPICKVAL(Activation_Line_Warning_Trigger__c, "Green"), IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm24.png", "Green", 16, 16), IMAGE("/img/s.gif", "NA", 16, 16) ) )
CustomField.label: Activation Line Warning Status
